scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd var-api && npm install" "cd var-spa && npm install" "cd var-ui && npm install"
scripts.preview: concurrently -k "cd var-api && npm run start" "cd var-ui && npm run build && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd var-api && npm run dev" "cd var-spa && npm run dev"
